title: Localita and the Badasserie
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out
description: A kiosk in the lobby of Academy Awards Clothes building in downtown. Offers comfort food including prepared vegan sandwiches, salads, and smoothies. Its signature is a breakfast sandwich made of veg sausage, soy-free cheese, chipotle sauce and maple syrup served on a multigrain English muffin. This location is fully vegan; its other outlets are not.
